lead_paragraph: Liverpool fans should raise the roof for returning manager Rafa Benitez when he brings his relegation-threatened Newcastle United to Anfield on Saturday, says Juergen Klopp.

headline.print_headline: Raise the Roof for Rafa, Says Klopp
headline.main: Raise the Roof for Rafa, Says Klopp

snippet: Liverpool fans should raise the roof for returning manager Rafa Benitez when he brings his relegation-threatened Newcastle United to Anfield on Saturday, says Juergen Klopp....
